PyAnnotation Module - PyEdge.py¶

class PyEdge.PyEdge(id, fromNode=None, toNode=None)[source]¶

Class of edges in PyGraph:

  • Each edge maintains the source (from) C{PyNode} and the destination. (to) C{PyNode}.
  • Edges may also contain one or more C{PyAnnotation} objects.
__init__(id, fromNode=None, toNode=None)[source]¶

C{PyEdge} Constructor.

Parameters:
  • id – C{str}
  • fromNode – C{PyNode}
  • toNode – C{PyNode}
